---
title: "Digital Artefacts - Stroop data"
output: html_notebook
---
 

```{r}
library(synapseClient)
synapseClient::synapseLogin()
```

```{r}
stroopData <- synTableQuery("select * from syn9645170")
stroopData <- stroopData@values
```

```{r}

View(stroopData@values)
```



```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(data=stroopData, aes(x=responseTimeMS, fill=type)) + geom_density(alpha=.6)
```
